001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.client;
002
003import io.restassured.http.Method;
004import io.restassured.response.Response;
005import io.restassured.specification.RequestSpecification;
006
007/**
008 * Represents a REST client for executing HTTP requests.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface defines a method to execute API requests using the given
011 * {@code RequestSpecification} and HTTP method.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015public interface RestClient {
016
017   /**
018    * Executes an API request using the provided request specification and HTTP method.
019    *
020    * @param spec   The {@code RequestSpecification} containing request details.
021    * @param method The HTTP method to be used for the request.
022    * @return The {@code Response} received from the server.
023    */
024   Response execute(RequestSpecification spec, Method method);
025
026}
